description: Isolate faces and facial features in an image.

blocks.name: detectFaces
blocks.description: Detect human faces in an image and returns face locations, and optionally with faceIds, landmarks, and attributes.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: To detect in a URL (or binary data) specified image.

args.name: returnFaceId
args.info: Return faceIds of the detected faces or not. The default value is true.

args.name: returnFaceLandmarks
args.info: Return face landmarks of the detected faces or not. The default value is false.

args.name: returnFaceAttributes
args.info: Analyze and return the one or more specified face attributes in the comma-separated string like "returnFaceAttributes=age,gender". Supported face attributes include age, gender, headPose, smile, facialHair, and glasses. Note that each face attribute analysis has additional computational and time cost.

blocks.name: findSimilarFaces
blocks.description: Given query face's faceId, to search the similar-looking faces from a faceId array or a faceListId.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceId
args.info: faceId of the query face. User needs to call detectFaces first to get a valid faceId. Note that this faceId is not persisted and will expire in 24 hours after the detection call.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: An existing user-specified unique candidate face list, created earlier. Parameter faceListId and faceIds should not be provided at the same time.

args.name: faceIds
args.info: An json array of candidate faceIds. All of them are created by detectFaces and the faceIds will expire in 24 hours after the detection call. The number of faceIds is limited to 1000. Parameter faceListId and faceIds should not be provided at the same time. See the parameter notes section for more information. See findSimilarFaces README for more details.

args.name: maxNumOfCandidatesReturned
args.info: The number of top similar faces returned. The valid range is [1, 1000].It defaults to 20.

args.name: mode
args.info: Similar face searching mode. It can be "matchPerson" or "matchFace". It defaults to "matchPerson".

blocks.name: divideFacesIntoGroups
blocks.description: Divide candidate faces into groups based on face similarity.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceIds
args.info: Json array of candidate faceId created by detectFaces. The maximum is 1000 faces. See the parameter notes section for more information. See divideFacesIntoGroups README for more details.

blocks.name: identifyFaces
blocks.description: Identify unknown faces from a person group.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceIds
args.info: Json array of query faces faceIds, created by the detectFaces. Each of the faces are identified independently. The valid number of faceIds is between [1, 10]. See the parameter notes section for more information. See identifyFaces README for more details.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: personGroupId of the target person group, created by createPersonGroup.

args.name: maxNumOfCandidatesReturned
args.info: The range of maxNumOfCandidatesReturned is between 1 and 5 (default is 1).

args.name: confidenceThreshold
args.info: Confidence threshold of identification, used to judge whether one face belong to one person. The range of confidenceThreshold is [0, 1] (default specified by algorithm).

blocks.name: verifyFaceToFace
blocks.description: Verify whether two faces belong to a same person

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceId1
args.info: faceId of one face, comes from detectFaces.

args.name: faceId2
args.info: faceId of one face, comes from detectFaces.

blocks.name: verifyFaceToPerson
blocks.description: Verify whether one face belongs to a person.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceId
args.info: faceId of face, comes from detectFaces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Using existing personGroupId and personId for fast loading a specified person. personGroupId is created in createPersonGroup.

args.name: personId
args.info: Specify a certain person in a person group. personId is created in createPerson.

blocks.name: addFaceToFaceList
blocks.description: Add a face to a face list.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

args.name: image
args.info: Image file. Image file size should between 1KB to 4MB. Only one face is allowed per image.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-specified data about the face list for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

args.name: targetFace
args.info: A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added into the face list, in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.

blocks.name: createFaceList
blocks.description: Create an empty face list with user-specified faceListId, name and an optional userData. Up to 64 face lists are allowed to exist in one subscription.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

args.name: name
args.info: Name of the created face list, maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: Optional user defined data for the face list. Length should not exceed 16KB.

blocks.name: deleteFaceFromFaceList
blocks.description: Delete an existing face from a face list (given by a persisitedFaceId and a faceListId). Persisted image related to the face will also be deleted.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

args.name: persistedFaceId
args.info: persistedFaceId of an existing face. Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

blocks.name: deleteFaceList
blocks.description: Delete an existing face list according to faceListId. Persisted face images in the face list will also be deleted.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

blocks.name: getFaceList
blocks.description: Retrieve a face list's information, including faceListId, name, userData and faces in the face list.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

blocks.name: getFaceLists
blocks.description: Retrieve information about all existing face lists. Only faceListId, name and userData will be returned.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

blocks.name: updateFaceList
blocks.description: Update information of a face list, including name and userData.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: faceListId
args.info: Valid character is letter in lower case or digit or '-' or '_', maximum length is 64.

args.name: name
args.info: Name of the created face list, maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: Optional user defined data for the face list. Length should not exceed 16KB.

blocks.name: addPersonFace
blocks.description: Add a representative face to a person for identification.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

args.name: personId
args.info: Target person that the face is added to.

args.name: image
args.info: Face image. Valid image size is from 1KB to 4MB. Only one face is allowed per image.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-specified data about the target face to add for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

args.name: targetFace
args.info: A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person, in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.

blocks.name: createPerson
blocks.description: Create a new person in a specified person group.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

args.name: name
args.info: Display name of the target person. The maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-specified data about the target face to add for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

blocks.name: deletePerson
blocks.description: Delete an existing person from a person group. Persisted face images of the person will also be deleted.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the person.

args.name: personId
args.info: The target personId to delete.

blocks.name: deletePersonFace
blocks.description: Delete a face from a person. Relative image for the persisted face will also be deleted.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the person.

args.name: personId
args.info: The target personId to delete.

args.name: persistedFaceId
args.info: The persisted face to remove.

blocks.name: getPerson
blocks.description: Retrieve a person's information, including registered persisted faces, name and userData.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the person.

args.name: personId
args.info: The target personId to delete.

blocks.name: getPersonFace
blocks.description: Retrieve information about a persisted face (specified by persistedFaceId, personId and its belonging personGroupId).

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the person.

args.name: personId
args.info: The target personId to delete.

args.name: persistedFaceId
args.info: The persistedFaceId of the target persisted face of the person.

blocks.name: getPersonsInPersonGroup
blocks.description: List all persons in a person group, and retrieve person information (including personId, name, userData and persistedFaceIds of registered faces of the person).

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: personGroupId of the target person group.

blocks.name: updatePerson
blocks.description: Update name or userData of a person.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

args.name: personId
args.info: personId of the target person.

args.name: name
args.info: Target person's display name. Maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-provided data attached to the person. Maximum length is 16KB.

blocks.name: updatePersonFace
blocks.description: Update a person persisted face's userData field.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

args.name: personId
args.info: personId of the target person.

args.name: persistedFaceId
args.info: persistedFaceId of target face, which is persisted and will not expire.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-provided data attached to the person. Maximum length is 16KB.

blocks.name: createPersonGroup
blocks.description: Create a new person group with specified personGroupId, name and user-provided userData.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: User-provided personGroupId as a string. The valid characters include numbers, English letters in lower case, '-' and '_'. The maximum length of the personGroupId is 64.

args.name: name
args.info: Person group display name. The maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-provided data attached to the person group. The size limit is 16KB.

blocks.name: deletePersonGroup
blocks.description: Delete an existing person group. Persisted face images of all people in the person group will also be deleted.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: User-provided personGroupId as a string. The valid characters include numbers, English letters in lower case, '-' and '_'. The maximum length of the personGroupId is 64.

blocks.name: getPersonGroup
blocks.description: Retrieve the information of a person group, including its name and userData.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: User-provided personGroupId as a string. The valid characters include numbers, English letters in lower case, '-' and '_'. The maximum length of the personGroupId is 64.

blocks.name: getPersonGroupTrainingStatus
blocks.description: Retrieve the training status of a person group (completed or ongoing).

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: User-provided personGroupId as a string. The valid characters include numbers, English letters in lower case, '-' and '_'. The maximum length of the personGroupId is 64.

blocks.name: getPersonGroups
blocks.description: List person groups and their information.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: start
args.info: List person groups from the least personGroupId greater than the "start". It contains no more than 64 characters. Default is empty.

args.name: top
args.info: The number of person groups to list, ranging in [1, 1000]. Default is 1000.

blocks.name: trainPersonGroup
blocks.description: Queue a person group training task, the training task may not be started immediately.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: Target person group to be trained.

blocks.name: updatePersonGroup
blocks.description: Update an existing person group's display name and userData. The properties which does not appear in request body will not be updated.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: personGroupId
args.info: personGroupId of the person group to be updated.

args.name: name
args.info: Person group display name. The maximum length is 128.

args.name: userData
args.info: User-provided data attached to the person group. The size limit is 16KB.
